_meanings:
{@--1@} Distressed, troubled, afflicted,
overwhelmed with grief, miserable;
<ls>Māl. 2. 3</ls>, <ls n="Māl.">9. 11</ls>, <ls>U. 3. 38</ls>, <ls n="U.">6. 41</ls>,
<ls>Ki. 11. 26</ls>; <ls>Śi. 9. 77</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">17. 66</ls>,  
<ls>Bh. 3. 8</ls>, <ls n="Bh. 3.">114.</ls>

{@--2@} Separation from a wife
or husband, bereavement suffered
by a lover or mistress.
